item.title: But one of many internet memes...
item.description: Kait (aka student dr. blaze) pinged me for an internet meme she filled out. Since I’m not sure I know many people with blogs, I suppose I’ll have to tap Richy and see if he’ll fill it out and pass it on. WERE YOU NAMED AFTER ANYONE? No WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU CRIED? Saturday DO YOU LIKE YOUR HANDWRITING? Yes, but I wish I could find a pen I like that’d allow me to write even smaller while maintaining legibility WHAT IS YOUR FAVORITE LUNCH MEAT?
